akn:section.akn:heading: Personnel development to improve services and results for children with disabilities

akn:content.akn:p: (a) In general The Secretary, on a competitive basis, shall award grants to, or enter into contracts or cooperative agreements with, eligible entities to carry out 1 or more of the following objectives:

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Personnel development; enhanced support for beginning special educators

akn:content.akn:p: (b) Personnel development; enhanced support for beginning special educators
(g) Scholarships The Secretary may include funds for scholarships, with necessary stipends and allowances, in awards under subsections (b), (c), and (d).
(i) Authorization of appropriations There are authorized to be appropriated to carry out this section such sums as may be necessary for each of the fiscal years 2005 through 2010.
